If.Condition: not HasQuest(65742) and not IsQuestCompleted(65742) and HasAtLeast(7868,1)

CodeChunks.CodeChunk: Core.OverlayManager.AddToast(() => "We are about to load Gardua Extreme to farm light, however it will NOT stop automatically. Watch it.", TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(25000), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(29,213,226), System.Windows.Media.Color.FromRgb(13,106,175), new System.Windows.Media.FontFamily("Gautami")); await Coroutine.Sleep(26000);
